sense.def:
To speculate about something
pomeni ugibati o tem, kaj ali kakšno je nekaj.

seg.quote: It is natural for us to speculate about the reasons for their visits.
Industry sources speculated that the least expensive model will be priced at £7000.
The papers are full of speculation about who is likely to be the next prime minister.

sense.def:
Na finančnem področju
to speculate
pomeni tudi kupovati nepremičnine ali delnice v upanju, da jih bomo pozneje lahko prodali z dobičkom.
